permission_denied_desc: Permission to access files has been denied, to continue you need to authorize it
delete_playlist_dialog_content:
Are you sure you want to delete the playlist?
This action is not reversible.
delete_song_dialog_content:
Are you sure you want to delete the song?
This action is not reversible and will also delete the file from the device
title: Title
permission_denied_manage_desc: Permission to manage files has been denied, to continue you need to authorize it
background_permission_settings_subtitle: Allow the player to continue even with the screen off
storage_permission_settings_subtitle: Allow access to songs saved on your device
permission_already_granted_desc: The permission has already been granted, to remove it you need to delete it from the device settings
rich_presence_settings_subtitle: Allows you to show the song you are listening to on Discord
search_online_settings_subtitle: Search for songs on Youtube and listen to them from the player
get_no_song_settings_subtitle: Allow loading files without title or artist
